chessclient
Class ChessPiece

java.lang.Object
  chessclient.ChessPiece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, EmptyPiece, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class ChessPiece
extends java.lang.Object

The class ChessPiece is the superclass for all chess pieces and the empty field.

Author:
Martin Thoma
